PrecisSELECTED LISTED FINANCIAL INSTITUTIONS ATTRIBUTION METHOD (GST/HST) REGULATIONS which establish special rules by which certain financial institutions calculate the federal sales tax that must be remitted by them, or is refundable to them, for each HST reporting period.
